My first post

20 Apr 2017

Hello.

Section

Here is some R code.

# comment
x <- 2
if (x > 1) print("kitten")

Subsection

Watch out for the

Block quote!

Subsubsection

I have an ordered list.

  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Three

However I also have an unordered list.

  • Thing
    • red
    • blue
  • Object
    • large
    • small
  • Stuff
    • inside
    • outside

Subsubsubsection

Finally, what is the best kind of formatting? Some people like italic and others like bold, but I like both.
